所有程序包的分层结构

程序包分层结构:
  • us.codecraft.webmagic,
  • us.codecraft.webmagic.downloader,
  • us.codecraft.webmagic.pipeline,
  • us.codecraft.webmagic.processor,
  • us.codecraft.webmagic.schedular,
  • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector,
  • us.codecraft.webmagic.utils

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.pipeline.ConsolePipeline (implements us.codecraft.webmagic.pipeline.Pipeline)
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.schedular.FileCacheQueueScheduler (implements us.codecraft.webmagic.schedular.Scheduler)
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.pipeline.FilePipeline (implements us.codecraft.webmagic.pipeline.Pipeline)
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.downloader.HttpClientDownloader (implements us.codecraft.webmagic.downloader.Downloader)
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.downloader.HttpClientPool
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.Page
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.PlainText (implements us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.Selectable)
      • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.Html
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.schedular.QueueScheduler (implements us.codecraft.webmagic.schedular.Scheduler)
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.RegexSelector
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.ReplaceSelector
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.Request
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.SelectorFactory
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.processor.SimplePageProcessor (implements us.codecraft.webmagic.processor.PageProcessor)
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.Site
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.SmartContentSelector
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.Spider (implements java.lang.Runnable, us.codecraft.webmagic.Task)
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.utils.ThreadUtils
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.utils.UrlUtils
    • us.codecraft.webmagic.selector.XpathSelector
